name: English Soccer Quiz for Experts | Sports

questions.text: Who has won most caps for England?
questions.explanation:
Peter Shilton.

	He won 125 caps in his career.

questions.text: Who was the first million pound transfer?
Up to the end of the 1999-2000 how many clubs have won the FA Premier League?
questions.explanation:
3.

	Manchester United, Blackburn and Arsenal have won since the Premiership was set up.

questions.text: What was the first English club to win the European Cup?
questions.explanation:
Manchester United.

	They won it in 1968.

questions.text: True or False. Bobby Charlton has scored the most goals for England?
questions.explanation:
False.

	He scored 49 goals and held the record for most England goals from 1968 until 2016.

questions.text: Which English player scored the quickest goal in the final stages of the World Cup?
Which two English clubs did George Best play for?
Who scored three goals for England in the World Cup final 1966?
Which player was involved in a record breaking 15 million pound transfer between two English Clubs?
questions.explanation:
Alan Shearer.

	He was sold from Blackburn to Newcastle United.

questions.text: Which premier league team play at St James Park?
